gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Field Card. Both Players cannot battle for 3 full turn cycles. This effect starts from the moment this card is played until three turn cycles have been completed and the player who laid this card has completed their draw step. At that time combat can be initiated again and this card leaves the field.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: While not as large as the T-Rex, the Allosaurus is still very deadly as they are known to travel in packs to survive.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: On Hit, the target creature takes 10 bleed damage. This damage over time effect occurs after the combat step has concluded for the turn this effect was applied. Damage over time effects are flat damage and receive no bonuses. This effect is continuous as long as this card is on the field. After the initial damage that occurs on hit, the effect of the Damage Over Time occurs once per turn cycle after the conclusion of the combat step.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: Angels are the embodiment of the light, and main force of the creator. They are under direct control of the Eternal Titan.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: When summoned, return a creature from your cemetery to your hand. This card cannot be returned from the cemetery. Creatures that are sacrificed to summon the Angel to the field are eligible to be affected by the Angels effect.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: Although not the best combat artist, the Assassin is a master of stealth and deadly sneak attacks.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: If the Assassin hits first during a battle step then the total damage, after all dice rolls plus modifiers is calculated, is tripled. Multipliers are the last thing applied to the addition and multiplication equation for calculating damage. Additional multipliers can be applied to this card and added at the end of the equation.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: During your turn, this card allows a target creature on your side of the field to have the following effects: Attack first during battle, Automatically Hit regardless of the result of the Hit Dice Roll, and apply a 3x Damage multiplier at the end of your damage calculations (multiple backstabs or any other creature/magic cards that add a damage multiplier would be multiplied together, use PEMDAS to calculate the overall damage. Example: 3 Backstab’s 3*3*3=27x damage multiplier). This card's ability to automatically Hit would supersede the creature effect of scarlet or other hit reducing cards such as ring of extremes.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Equip: Target a creature and reduce the equipped creature's speed stat by 6 points as long as this card is equipped to that card. This card remains in the magic play area of the person who played it. This card negates any speed stat increases from other creature effects or magic cards.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: This monster searches the darkest areas of the world for its prey. Even dragons fear the mighty Basilisk.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: While on the field the target creature takes 5 poison damage once per turn cycle until this card leaves the field. This effect occurs at the end of the combat phase and prior to the wrap-up phase.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: These creatures spend their free time tracking down adventurers for an easy kill.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen1-ed2.flavorText: Black dragons were formally red dragons. They betrayed their brethren and allied with the Fire God. This turned their scales as black as ash.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: During your turn, roll 1 die. If 6, your opponent must skip their next turn. This completely skips your opponent's turn. If you rolled a 6 at the end of your turn you will then begin a new turn and start by drawing a card as if your opponent had just ended their turn.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: When your opponent casts a magic card, negate the card effect and send it to the cemetery. This card stops the activation of another magic card and therefore the attempted to be played magic card never has its effect activated and will go to the cemetery. Example: Heroism magic card is immune to magic cards. However, due to Blade in the Dark negating the magic card before its effect can occur, Blade in the Dark would destroy the Heroism magic card and send it to the cemetery.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Equip: Add lifesteal to this creature. Heal the equipped creature for half the amount of attack damage the equipped card inflicts on the target creature it attacks. If a reflect spell or or other block spell is used the creature equipped with Blood of the bat does not heal. Only direct battle damage counts towards this card's effect.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: While not as powerful as the red dragons, blue dragons are cunning beasts of the winter frost.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: On hit, roll 1 die. If 4-6, your target is frozen for one turn cycle and cannot battle or be sacrificed. If a creature is frozen during a battle and the frozen creature goes second they cannot rebuttal during that battle. A frozen creature may be killed and another creature can be summoned. However, the frozen creature cannot be used as sacrifice material for the newly summoned creature.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: On hit, play this card from your hand. Add 5 extra Attack dice rolls to your attacking creature for this battle. This only adds extra damage to an attack. This card does not add extra Hit Dice rolls.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: An eternal being of destruction. If the Creator shaped the cosmos, then the Cosmic Demon will be the one to destroy it.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Field: Destroy all magic cards on the field. Magic cards cannot be played or activated for 3 turn cycles. This affects the entire play field. Once the 3 turn cycles have concluded Cosmic Negation is destroyed and sent to the Cemetery.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Destroy 1 magic card on the field.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Field: All creatures on the opposing side field have their Armor Level reduced to 1. This card supersedes other Armor Level increasing cards. This card does not affect cards such as Heroism due to the card's antimagic effect.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: These elves are followers of the dark arcane arts. Dark Elves are considered mysterious to the civilized world.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: When this card hits, roll 1 die, If the result of this dice roll is 1-3 you can roll 4 extra Attack Dice for this battle. This effect can only be applied once per battle.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: Once a knight of The Light. These wicked beings have fallen to a darker path on the road to justice.They do not see themselves as evil.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: During the player who controls this card's turn this creature may summon 1 undead creature back to the field from the card owner's cemetery as a limited summoned creature. This card may only control 1 summoned undead on the field at a time. If this effect is nullified in any way, or this card leaves the field for any reason, send the summoned undead creature back to the cemetery. Summoned creatures may be sent back to the owner's hand through various card effects such as Wrath of the Old ones. Summoned undead do not change ownership along with Dark Knight if Dark Knight changes ownership through various card effects.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: Dark ruler of the Under Lands. This man has devoted himself to proving that men can be as powerful as gods.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: This card affects all creatures on your side of the field: For one turn cycle, this card allows creatures under your control on your side of the field to hit their targets regardless of the result of the Hit Dice roll. Double 6’s (Critical Hit damage) still applies and does double damage. Critical Misses do not count against the player who used this card. This card's ability to automatically Hit would supersede the creature effect of scarlet or other hit reducing cards such as ring of extremes.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: The main force of the Demon King's army. These creatures thrive on inflicting pain. Demons have an uncanny hatred for the undead, seeing them as an abomination.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen1-ed2.flavorText: The ruler of Hell, and enemy of The Light. The Demon King has led two full scale invasions into Ward. Both were a terrible failure. He answers only to the Cosmic Demon, however, he shares no love for his celestial master.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: During your turn, you may roll 1 die. If the result of the dice roll is 1-2, destroy all magic cards on your opponent's side of the field.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: During the empire of man many knights sold their souls to the demon king in exchange for power. They now hold more power than any human knight, but are bound to hell for an eternity of torment.
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: During your turn roll 1 die. If the result of the dice roll is 4-6 your opponent's primary creature is burned for 10 Health Points of damage.

gen1-ed2.flavorText: N/A
gen1-ed2.extendedEffectDescription: Equip this card to a creature on the field. Once equipped the equipped creature has their remaining Health Points reduced by half and gain +5 to both their Hit and Attack Modifiers. This card has a secondary effect that negates all creature effects for any creature on the field. Continuous effects such as Necromancer's resurrection abilities would be stopped and the resurrected creature would be sent back to the cemetery until this card's effect ends.

gen2.extendedEffectDescription: If your opponent uses a magic lightning card you may summon this card from your hand to the field as a Limited Summon. If at any point the player who currently controls this card does not have a primary creature on the field this card is sent to the cemetery. This card cannot be a primary summoned creature. This card is not removed from the field during standard primary creature sacrificing.

Equip this card to one of your opponents creatures on the field. While this card is equipped to a creature the primary creature under the same control as the equipped creature takes 10 damage each time the controlling player draws a card.

gen2.flavorText: Acolytes are priests in training at the Citadel of Dawn in High Rock. They serve the Holy Order as healers.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: Prior to drawing a card during your draw phase heal this card for 5 points of health.

gen2.flavorText: Alknosts are created when harpies steal the remaining light from other Harpies. This is a vain attempt to regain a semblance of their former glory as Angels.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: Once per turn cycle you may summon a Harpy or Alkonost from our hand or deck as a limited summon. If the Alkonost that summoned them to the field through its effect is killed or removed from the field they are not removed from the field as well. For each Harpy or Alkonost on the field, other than your primary creature, increase the primary creature's Attack dice by +1 and its Hit/Attack modifier by +1.

Equip this card to a creature on the field. Add the opposing players primary creatures Attack Dice rolls and Hit/Attack Modifier to the equipped creature. This card cannot be used with other “All in One” Magic cards. This effect only applies to the base stats of the opposing creatures.

While in the combat phase you may play this card from your hand. Summon a creature from your hand at no sacrificing cost as a limited summon to the field until the end of your turn. At the end of your turn return this card to your hand.
Increase the Attack of your primary creatures attack modifier by 2. This card is a field card and remains on the field until destroyed.

gen2.flavorText: A byproduct during the creation of the physical universe.This entity relishes in corrupting mortals, and forcing them into worshiping it. It feeds on the negative emotions from the mortal soul.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: While this card is on the field and during your opponent's turn, if they control any limited summons, your opponent must initiate battle with each of their limited summons against their primary creature. This battle should be treated as any other battle between 2 creatures from opposing opponents. All normal combat rules apply. Magic cards can be played during this time.

While this card is on the field all players must roll a die. If the result of all the dice rolled match then all primary creatures on the field take 100hp damage. The player whose turn it currently is may choose when to have everyone roll for this effect during their turn.

While this card is on the field all creatures on both sides of the field that have an Armor Level of 6 or less and have no card effect have +1 Attack Dice Rolls. Creatures that have a summoning requirement are not considered Effect creatures.

gen2.flavorText: A young dinosaur. These creatures are still very aggressive and often hunt down dragonlings to eat.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A
Increase the Attack and Hit modifier stats of the creature in which this card is equipped to by 2 each. This card can be equipped to only 1 creature card at a time.

gen2.flavorText: This creature is as fast as it is strong and is often mistaken for a werebear. However, this creature shares no love for its lycanthrope cousin.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: This creature always attacks first during battle. This effect works independent of the speed stat.

gen2.flavorText: These small aquatic rodents are not strong predators. However, what they lack in strength they make up for in their incredible ability to build.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen2.flavorText: These majestic creatures roam the forests of Ward. They are mostly timid, but can be incredibly aggressive during the rut. During the hunting season, they vanish!!
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

This card can only be equipped to a creature that currently has 9 or less remaining health points. Once equipped, heal the equipped creature 30 health points. While equipped, the equipped creature has its Hit and Attack Roll results doubled.

gen2.flavorText: Though not very strong, the Black Jacket hornet carries a devastating toxin in its body that can kill even the strongest creatures.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: If the creature card “Hive Lord” is on your side of the field this card can be summoned directly from your hand to the field as a Limited Summon. Return this card to the original owner’s hand if “Hive Lord” leaves the field or changes control. This is considered a Summoning Requirement and black Jacket is considered a Non-Effect creature while on the field.
Equip this card to 1 creature on the field. If this card is removed from the field it explodes and deals 30hp of damage to the equipped creature.

This card is a field card and affects all players. While this card is on the field players cannot remove cards from their cemetery. Cards such as Holy Light or Frog of Fortune can still be played but their effect would not do anything.

gen2.flavorText: When the Bronto walks, the earth shakes with the sounds of thunder across the plains. They use their whip-like tail to fend off predators.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A

gen2.flavorText: This creature was created by the Westward Trading Company in Buck City. He was created to sell to the highest bidder as a weapon.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A
This card is a field card and affects all players. While this card is on the field, creatures that are “Bug” type creatures take 2x damage.
Increase the Armor Level, Speed, Attack Modifier, and Hit Modifier stats of the creature in which this card is equipped to by 2 each. This card can be equipped to only 1 creature card at a time.

gen2.flavorText: The Bunnysaurus is one of the lesser-known dinosaurs of Ward. Its exceptionally large ears can alert them of danger from miles away.
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: While this card is on the field you may choose to negate an attack against this card, or negate the activation of a magic. This effect can only be used one time while this card is on the field.

gen2.flavorText: Captain Ward is the embodiment of the planet Ward. He was created through the wishes of a cult of young humans to clean the garbage of the Order and Cabal. “Time to take out the trash”. -Captain Ward
gen2.extendedEffectDescription: N/A
